backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining KayakDesign type and providing functions to add kayak designs to a list and retrieve all designs sorted by year descending.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: gallery view, admin form, water-themed visual design, and generated asset rendering with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 11 frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the kayak design showcase application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with water-themed color palette and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'Whitewater Kayak Design Showcase' and root div mounting the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining root, gallery (/), and admin (/admin) routes wrapped in Layout component with RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/AddKayakForm.tsx: Form component with validation for adding kayak designs (name, manufacturer, year, image URL, external link) with success/error alerts and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section displaying generated rapids background image with gradient overlay, animated badge, and headline promoting whitewater kayak design exploration.
frontend/src/components/KayakCard.tsx: Card component rendering individual kayak design with image, name, manufacturer, year badge, and external link button with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/KayakGallery.tsx: Gallery component fetching and displaying kayak designs in responsive grid with loading spinner, error alert, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout with sticky header containing logo, navigation (Gallery/Add Design), and footer with social links and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the ICP backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all kayak designs and adding new kayak designs, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom water-inspired color palette (teals, blues) for light and dark modes, plus utility classes for gradient and shimmer animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin page component that displays the AddKayakForm with navigation back to the gallery and descriptive header text.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Gallery page component that renders the Hero section followed by the KayakGallery component displaying all kayak designs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom OKLCH color system, typography fonts (Inter, Outfit), border radius variables, water-themed shadows, and flow animations for the kayaking theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking completed features (gallery view, admin form, water theme, generated assets) and pending requirements for backend data model and methods.
